channel.title: Install OONI Probe on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference

item.title: Download OONI Probe Desktop
item.description: Download OONI Probe for Windows Download OONI Probe for macOS Other Platforms »

item.title: Install OONI Probe CLI
item.description: To install OONI Probe on the command line, follow the installation instructions for the platforms below: Debian/Ubuntu macOS Upon installation, OONI Probe will run tests automatically every day!

item.title: Install OONI Probe CLI on Debian/Ubuntu Linux
item.description: Install the bintray GPG key: sudo apt-key adv --verbose --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys '8756C4F765C9AC3CB6B85D62379CE192D401AB61' Add the extra repository: echo "deb https://dl.bintray.com/ooni/ooniprobe-debian/ unstable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ooniprobe.list Update package manager sudo apt-get update Install OONI Probe sudo apt-get install ooniprobe-cli

item.title: Install OONI Probe CLI on macOS
item.description: Install homebrew Install ooniprobe brew install ooniprobe Start automatic daily run ooniprobe autorun start

item.title: Measure internet censorship
item.description: Download OONI Probe Desktop Windows 64-bit macOS Install OONI Probe Mobile Install OONI Probe CLI Github Readme
